title: Is there anyway you can block someone from logging into your account besides changing a password?
body:
I have a friend and his ex GF wont stop logging onto his account! Is there anyway he can block her ip address or something? He keeps changing his email passwords and for League but she some how manages to find out the passwords and resets his settings and password.
